user_stories.action: learn about LaZZy
user_stories.result: I can be motivated to sign up

user_stories.result: I know what I am agreeing to

user_stories.result: I can be placed in the correct network

user_stories.result: my correct information can be displayed

user_stories.action: to set up my payment information
user_stories.result: I can pay and be paid

user_stories.result: I can access my account

user_stories.action: to reset my password
user_stories.result: if I forget my current password, I can regain access to my account

user_stories.action: to be reminded that there's working users available to help me out
user_stories.result: I can be motivated to request help

user_stories.result: I can request help on the right task

user_stories.result: I can request help from someone

user_stories.result: whoever helps me with my task receives all the right information

user_stories.action: to book my requested task and pay
user_stories.result: it can queued up in the task feed

user_stories.action: to be notified when there's a batch of new requests
user_stories.result: I can be motivated to help out as a working user

user_stories.action: to view all the requests in the task list
user_stories.result: I can see what lazy users need help with

user_stories.action: to see details on a request
user_stories.result: I can decide whether to help with it or not

user_stories.action: commit to a request in the task list
user_stories.result: I can work on it and get paid

user_stories.action: to be notified when a working user has committed to my request
user_stories.result: I can know I will be getting help with my task

user_stories.action: to see a list of all the tasks I've committed to
user_stories.result: I can keep track of them and my messages with the lazy users

user_stories.action: to see a list of all the tasks I've requested help with
user_stories.result: I can keep track of them and the messages with the working users

user_stories.action: to be reminded of a tomorrow task
user_stories.result: I can accomplish my commitment

user_stories.action: to be able to communicate with a lazy user
user_stories.result: I can communicate with them while helping them out

user_stories.action: to communicate with a working user
user_stories.result: I can communicate with them while they're helping me out

user_stories.action: to receive a notification when I receive a new message
user_stories.result: I can stay on top of my communication

user_stories.action: to mark a task as complete
user_stories.result: engagement is finalized

user_stories.action: to be notified when my request has been completed
user_stories.result: I can know that I have one less thing to do

user_stories.action: to rate my experience with my working user
user_stories.result: LaZZy can maintain a network of great users

user_stories.action: to rate my experience with my lazy user
user_stories.result: LaZZy can maintain a network of great users

user_stories.action: to send out a status update
user_stories.result: I can notify lazy users of my availability and motivate them to request help

user_stories.action: to receive a notification when a working user posts a status update
user_stories.result: I can be motivated to request a task

user_stories.action: to receive a notification when other users are requesting similar tasks to the task I made myself available for
user_stories.result: I can get a lead on them

user_stories.action: to see an activity feed of all my alerts and notifications
user_stories.result: I can keep track of them

user_stories.result: they can earn credit and I can earn credit too

user_stories.result: I can earn credit

user_stories.result: I can manage and update my details

user_stories.result: I'm no longer logged in
